entry.sentence: The three Compsognathus ' lay huddled close together and shivering in a corner of the large basement room , which was hermetically sealed off from the outside world by a massive pane of glass .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (CD three) (NNS Compsognathus) (POS ')) (NN lay)) (VP (VBD huddled) (S (S (VP (VB close) (ADVP (RB together)))) (CC and) (S (VP (VBG shivering) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN corner)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ large) (NN basement) (NN room)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB hermetically)) (VP (VBN sealed) (PRT (RP off)) (PP (IN from) (NP (DT the) (JJ outside) (NN world))) (PP (IN by) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ massive) (NN pane)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN glass))))))))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(Compsognathus-3, The-1) num(Compsognathus-3, three-2) poss(lay-5, Compsognathus-3) nsubj(huddled-6, lay-5) root(ROOT-0, huddled-6) dep(huddled-6, close-7) advmod(close-7, together-8) dep(huddled-6, shivering-10) conj_and(close-7, shivering-10) det(corner-13, a-12) prep_in(shivering-10, corner-13) det(room-18, the-15) amod(room-18, large-16) nn(room-18, basement-17) prep_of(corner-13, room-18) nsubjpass(sealed-23, room-18) auxpass(sealed-23, was-21) advmod(sealed-23, hermetically-22) rcmod(room-18, sealed-23) prt(sealed-23, off-24) det(world-28, the-26) amod(world-28, outside-27) prep_from(sealed-23, world-28) det(pane-32, a-30) amod(pane-32, massive-31) agent(sealed-23, pane-32) prep_of(pane-32, glass-34)

entry.sentence: Thanks to artificial light and an adjustable temperature and humidity , conditions here were ideal for them , at least in this respect .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (VBG Thanks) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (JJ artificial) (NN light)) (CC and) (NP (DT an) (JJ adjustable) (NN temperature) (CC and) (NN humidity))))) (, ,) (NP (NNS conditions)) (ADVP (RB here)) (VP (VBD were) (ADJP (JJ ideal)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP them))) (, ,) (ADVP (ADVP (IN at) (JJS least)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT this) (NN respect))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: prepc_thanks_to(ideal-15, to-2) amod(light-4, artificial-3) pobj(ideal-15, light-4) det(temperature-8, an-6) amod(temperature-8, adjustable-7) conj_and(light-4, temperature-8) pobj(ideal-15, temperature-8) conj_and(light-4, humidity-10) conj_and(temperature-8, humidity-10) nsubj(ideal-15, conditions-12) advmod(ideal-15, here-13) cop(ideal-15, were-14) root(ROOT-0, ideal-15) prep_for(ideal-15, them-17) advmod(ideal-15, at-19) pobj(at-19, least-20) det(respect-23, this-22) prep_in(at-19, respect-23)

entry.sentence: The Compsognathus belonged to the smallest dinosaurs at all .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NNPS Compsognathus)) (VP (VBD belonged) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJS smallest) (NNS dinosaurs)) (ADVP (IN at) (DT all))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Its body was hardly bigger than that of a chicken .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ Its) (NN body)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB hardly) (JJR bigger)) (PP (IN than) (NP (NP (DT that)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT a) (NN chicken)))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Only because of its long , pointed tail it reached a total body length of just under three quarters of a meter .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (RB Only) (PP (RB because) (IN of) (NP (PRP$ its) (JJ long) (, ,) (JJ pointed) (NN tail))) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD reached) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ total) (NN body) (NN length)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (QP (RB just) (IN under) (CD three)) (NNS quarters)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT a) (NN meter))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(reached-10, Only-1) poss(tail-8, its-4) amod(tail-8, long-5) amod(tail-8, pointed-7) prep_because_of(reached-10, tail-8) nsubj(reached-10, it-9) root(ROOT-0, reached-10) det(length-14, a-11) amod(length-14, total-12) nn(length-14, body-13) dobj(reached-10, length-14) advmod(under-17, just-16) quantmod(three-18, under-17) num(quarters-19, three-18) prep_of(length-14, quarters-19) det(meter-22, a-21) prep_of(quarters-19, meter-22)

entry.sentence: Only occasionally one of the animals stirred .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (ADVP (RB Only) (RB occasionally)) (NP (NP (CD one)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NNS animals)))) (VP (VBD stirred)) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(occasionally-2, Only-1) advmod(stirred-7, occasionally-2) nsubj(stirred-7, one-3) det(animals-6, the-5) prep_of(one-3, animals-6) root(ROOT-0, stirred-7)

entry.sentence: Actually they were nimble hunters , feeding on lizards and insects , and for that reason alone they had to be extremely fast and agile .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (ADVP (RB Actually)) (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD were) (NP (JJ nimble) (NNS hunters)) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG feeding) (PP (IN on) (NP (NNS lizards) (CC and) (NNS insects))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (DT that) (NN reason)) (ADVP (RB alone)))) (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD had) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB be) (ADJP (RB extremely) (JJ fast) (CC and) (JJ agile))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(hunters-5, Actually-1) nsubj(hunters-5, they-2) cop(hunters-5, were-3) amod(hunters-5, nimble-4) root(ROOT-0, hunters-5) partmod(hunters-5, feeding-7) prep_on(feeding-7, lizards-9) prep_on(feeding-7, insects-11) conj_and(lizards-9, insects-11) det(reason-16, that-15) prep_for(had-19, reason-16) advmod(reason-16, alone-17) nsubj(had-19, they-18) xsubj(fast-23, they-18) conj_and(hunters-5, had-19) aux(fast-23, to-20) cop(fast-23, be-21) advmod(fast-23, extremely-22) xcomp(had-19, fast-23) xcomp(had-19, agile-25) conj_and(fast-23, agile-25)

entry.sentence: However , since they had already hatched from their eggs in this room , they had had to get used to the confinement from childhood , and because they were also fed regularly , they were not dependent on hunting and killing prey , so they had of necessity become largely passive and sluggish .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (ADVP (RB However)) (, ,) (S (S (SBAR (IN since) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB already)) (VP (VBN hatched) (PP (IN from) (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS eggs))) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT this) (NN room))))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN had) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB get) (VP (VBN used) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN confinement)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NN childhood)))))))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (SBAR (IN because) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD were) (ADVP (RB also)) (VP (VBN fed) (ADVP (RB regularly)))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD were) (RB not) (ADJP (JJ dependent) (PP (IN on) (S (VP (VBG hunting) (CC and) (VBG killing) (NP (NN prey))))))))) (, ,) (IN so) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD had) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN necessity))) (VP (VBN become) (S (ADJP (RB largely) (JJ passive) (CC and) (JJ sluggish)))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Boris Corman observed it with satisfaction .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Boris) (NNP Corman)) (VP (VBD observed) (NP (PRP it)) (PP (IN with) (NP (NN satisfaction)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nn(Corman-2, Boris-1) nsubj(observed-3, Corman-2) root(ROOT-0, observed-3) dobj(observed-3, it-4) prep_with(observed-3, satisfaction-6)

entry.sentence: He had bred the dinosaurs , but he hated them with all his heart , and it was only for research reasons that he had secretly conducted their breeding in the basement of his house .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN bred) (NP (DT the) (NNS dinosaurs))))) (, ,) (CC but) (S (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD hated) (NP (PRP them)) (PP (IN with) (NP (PDT all) (PRP$ his) (NN heart))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB only)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN research) (NNS reasons))) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB secretly)) (VP (VBN conducted) (NP (PRP$ their) (NN breeding)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN basement)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN house)))))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Research that ultimately aimed at the complete extinction of all dinosaurs !
